CustomField.description: If TRUE your price book is automatically updated with new products that meet stored filter criteria. EXAMPLE: a program for Red Wing & Steel Toe and a new product product is manufactured that is Red Wing & Steel Toe it will be added to your price book. Field Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If TRUE your price book is automatically updated with new products that meet stored filter criteria. EXAMPLE: a program for Red Wing & Steel Toe and a new product product is manufactured that is Red Wing & Steel Toe it will be added to your price book.
CustomField.label: Auto Add Products
